contentTypes.name: Hero Block
contentTypes.description: Splash image with heading and button, usually used at the top of a page

contentTypes.name: Home
contentTypes.description: The basic info for the home page.

contentTypes.name: Page
contentTypes.description: Pages on the site that can hold content blocks

defaultValue.en-US: Pueblo Unido creates hope for and amplifies the voices of communities with vulnerable immigration status by connecting them to legal, social, and Indigenous language interpretation services.
defaultValue.es: Pueblo Unido crea esperanza y amplifica las voces de las comunidades con estatus migratorio vulnerable al conectarlas con servicios legales, sociales e interpretación de idiomas originarios.

contentTypes.name: Divider Text Block
contentTypes.description: A full-width block that contains the space for one block of text.

contentTypes.name: Image Grid Block
contentTypes.description: A grid of images - holds up to 5 images in a specific order and orientation.

contentTypes.name: Our History Block
contentTypes.description: A block displaying a timeline with 4 years which include blocks of text.

contentTypes.name: Donation Tiers Block
contentTypes.description: A block showing three donation tiers, with customizable headings, subheadings, and CTA.

defaultValue.en-US: Help us respond to one ICE raid alert.
Support a family facing deportation for one week.
Fund a community rights education workshop.

validations.message: You must provide an Image Slide.

contentTypes.name: Heading
contentTypes.description: The heading that appears at the top of all pages except for the Home page.

contentTypes.name: Quick Statistics Block
contentTypes.description: A block showing a heading, and three numerical statistics with descriptions.

contentTypes.name: Image and Text Block
contentTypes.description: Displays an image alongside and heading and description text.

validations.message: Only bold, italic, and underline marks are allowed
Only unordered list and ordered list nodes are allowed

contentTypes.name: Stat Block
contentTypes.description: A block specifically for a statistic which contains a stat and a description.

contentTypes.name: Resource Block
contentTypes.description: This is a block for a downloadable resource. It contains a space to put a heading, description, and image. The heading and description will be inherited from the PDF resource, so you only need to provide a preview image and the downloadable resource.

contentTypes.name: Resources Block
contentTypes.description: Contains a series of Resource Blocks under one heading.

settings.helpText: Optional. Smaller text that will appear under the heading
Optional. Text for a button to appear inside the hero. If blank, no button will appear.

Title of the page in Spanish
